Pre-Game Insights: The Trail Blazers will attempt to break their seven-game road slide when they face the Los Angeles Lakers.
The Lakers are 15-7 against Western Conference opponents, while the Trail Blazers have gone 10-19 against Western Conference opponents.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Lakers average 50.1 points per game in the paint, led by Anthony Davis averaging 14.8 points.
The Trail Blazers give up 117.3 points to opponents while being outscored by 9.2 points per game.
The Lakers average 111.9 points per game, 5.4 fewer points than the 117.3 the Trail Blazers allow.
Others: Anthony Davis is averaging 26.1 points, 11.6 rebounds, 3.5 assists, and two blocks for the Lakers.
Anfernee Simons is averaging 17.5 points and 4.9 assists for the Trail Blazers.
The Lakers have gone 6-4 in their last 10 games, averaging 112.9 points, 43.3 rebounds, 26.0 assists, 8.5 steals, and 5.9 blocks per game.
The Trail Blazers have gone 3-7 in their last 10 games, averaging 110.1 points, 43.0 rebounds, 24.4 assists, 7.0 steals, and 4.9 blocks per game.
